Name: Bios
Notes: Cyborg brother, the builder who thrived through mitosis and growing life

Name: Viros
Notes: Cyborg brother, viral entity who spreads through cunning replication, consuming life

Name: Dedos
Notes: Cyborg brother who rejected cyborg enhancement, preferring natural purity, line died from starvation and radiation

Name: Tezca
Notes: Sun under which the three brothers lived and carved their legacies

Name: Hesper
Notes: Planet that faced destruction from a meteor impact, forcing remnants to flee

Name: Venti
Notes: Gas giant that survivors traveled toward after Hesper's destruction

Name: Phaestia
Notes: Shining moon of Venti, refuge destination for the survivors of Hesper

Name: Anti-vaxxers
Notes: Followers of Dedos' philosophy, united in quest for natural purity
